chapter_goal: Explore the phantom ship for clues

characters.name: Lin Xiu
characters.personality: Skilled in psychological manipulation, always wears a glove on the left hand
characters.health_status: Heterochromia (left eye golden, right eye brown)

characters.name: Chen Xiaodao
characters.personality: Seems timid but actually has amazing powers of observation

relationships.new_detail: Chen Xiaodao recognizes Dr. Su from his previous medical procedure
Chen Xiaodao notices Lin Xiu's left glove is missing but says nothing

scenes.name: The Phantom Deck
scenes.atmosphere: Eerie, shifting mist obscures peripheral vision

scenes.name: Crew Quarters
scenes.atmosphere: Claustrophobic with faint breathing sounds from empty rooms

scenes.name: Engine Room
scenes.atmosphere: Oppressive heat with unnatural cold spots

events.name: UV Awareness
events.details: Chen Xiaodao instinctively keeps his sleeves rolled down despite the heat, noticing the ship's lights emit unusual UV patterns
consequences: Realizes the ship's lighting is abnormal

events.name: Gambler's Tell
events.details: From his service training, Chen Xiaodao notices Lin Xiu's subtle left hand tremor characteristic of gambling withdrawal
consequences: Chen Xiaodao mentally catalogs this information

events.name: Doctor Recognition
events.details: Chen Xiaodao recognizes Su Mingyue as the surgeon who operated on him years ago, but chooses not to reveal this
consequences: Chen Xiaodao decides to secretly protect Dr. Su

events.name: Crew Manifest Discovery
events.details: Chen Xiaodao's familiarity with cruise operations helps him spot anomalies in the crew records that others overlook

events.name: Golden Eye Observation
events.details: In the engine room shadows, Chen Xiaodao spots the faint glow from Lin Xiu's left eye but pretends not to notice
consequences: Chen Xiaodao now suspects Lin Xiu is connected to the ship's mysteries

events.name: Temperature Anomaly
events.details: Though others feel cold, Chen Xiaodao's UV sensitivity makes him perceive heat from supernatural phenomena others can't detect
consequences: Realizes his medical condition may be key to understanding the ship
